36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <krb5/roken.h>
39
40/*
41 * Like write but never return partial data.
42 */
43
44#ifndef _WIN32
45
46ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION ssize_t ROKEN_LIB_CALL
47net_write (rk_socket_t fd, const void *buf, size_t nbytes)
48{
49 const char *cbuf = (const char *)buf;
50 ssize_t count;
51 size_t rem = nbytes;
52
53 while (rem > 0) {
54 count = write (fd, cbuf, rem);
55 if (count < 0) {
56 if (errno == EINTR)
57 continue;
58 else
59 return count;
60 }
61 cbuf += count;
62 rem -= count;
63 }
64 return nbytes;
65}
66
67#else
68
69ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION ssize_t ROKEN_LIB_CALL
70net_write(rk_socket_t sock, const void *buf, size_t nbytes)
71{
72 const char *cbuf = (const char *)buf;
73 ssize_t count;
74 size_t rem = nbytes;
75#ifdef SOCKET_IS_NOT_AN_FD
76 int use_write = 0;
77#endif
78
79 while (rem > 0) {
80#ifdef SOCKET_IS_NOT_AN_FD
81 if (use_write)
82 count = _write (sock, cbuf, rem);
83 else
84 count = send (sock, cbuf, rem, 0);
85
86 if (use_write == 0 &&
87 rk_IS_SOCKET_ERROR(count) &&
88 (rk_SOCK_ERRNO == WSANOTINITIALISED ||
89 rk_SOCK_ERRNO == WSAENOTSOCK)) {
90 use_write = 1;
91
92 count = _write (sock, cbuf, rem);
93 }
94#else
95 count = send (sock, cbuf, rem, 0);
96#endif
97 if (count < 0) {
98 if (errno == EINTR)
99 continue;
100 else
101 return count;
102 }
103 cbuf += count;
104 rem -= count;
105 }
106 return nbytes;
107}
108
109#endif
110
